item.title: KOS
item.description: score:86 Chances: Kosmos Energy has a sustainable exploration program balanced between proven basin infrastructure-led exploration, emerging basins, and frontier basins, indicating potential for significant discoveries. The company has assets in production offshore Ghana, Equatorial Guinea, U.S. Gulf of Mexico, and a gas development offshore Mauritania and Senegal, providing diversified revenue streams.
